QuestData.Title: Digging Through Bones
QuestData.Description: Oy! You look like you can take care of yerself, $r. Me and the crew here are looking for a bodyguard to watch over us while we hit a dig site to the north. The pay is pretty good and all you gotta do is make sure no nasty creatures kill me or any of my employees.$B$BIf you successfully make it back without any casualties, Dwarfowitz over there will pay ya.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Letoll and his crew and protect them while they make their dig. Return to Dwarfowitz at the Sha'tari Base Camp if you succeed.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Dwarfowitz at The Bone Wastes in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You get paid when the job is done, $Gsonny:missy;.
QuestData.RewardText: A bone worm! Fantastic! This may actually be the first time in recorded history that Letoll has actually made a discovery.
